translation.en: [narrator] As puberty begins, hormones are released
translation.zh: （布里奇顿中学） 青春期开始后 身体会分泌荷尔蒙

translation.en: and the sexual organs begin to change.
translation.zh: 性器官开始发生改变

translation.en: The uterus is the center of female reproductive activity...
translation.zh: 子宫是女性生殖活动的中心

translation.en: The uterus? I thought girls had vaginas.
translation.zh: 子宫？我以为女孩长的是阴道

translation.en: I thought that, too, but I guess they don't.
translation.zh: 我也是 看来她们没长阴道

translation.en: Maybe vagina is, like, slang.
translation.zh: 也许阴道是个俗称

translation.en: [voice] Did someone say "vagina"?
translation.zh: -有人说“阴道”吗？-不 别在现在

translation.en: -Oh, no, no, no. Not now. -Fuck, yeah, now!
translation.zh: -有人说“阴道”吗？-不 别在现在 就是现在

translation.en: Go away. You are not real.
translation.zh: 走开 你不是真的

translation.en: You're just some hormone monster my brain created.
translation.zh: 你只是我大脑创造出来的荷尔蒙男怪

translation.en: If I'm not real, then how come I'm sending blood
translation.zh: 如果我不是真的 那我是怎么让你可爱的小丁丁充血的？

translation.en: to your sweet penis right now?
translation.zh: 那我是怎么让你可爱的小丁丁充血的？

translation.en: -[moans] Come on. -[narrator] The ovaries release the egg,
translation.zh: -拜托-卵子从卵巢中排出

translation.en: then travel down the Fallopian tube.
translation.zh: 经过输卵管

translation.en: "Fallopian." What a savory word.
translation.zh: 输卵管 多么可口的词语

translation.en: Describes exactly what it is, you know what I mean?
translation.zh: 真是管如其名 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, I should tell you, this is school and we need boundaries.
translation.zh: 好了 我必须告诉你这里是学校 我们得有个界限

translation.en: If you want me to go away, you know what you have to do.
translation.zh: 如果你想要让我离开你知道该做什么的

translation.en: -[sighs] Jerk off-- -Jerk off, yeah, yeah, yeah! Exactly.
translation.zh: -打飞机…-打飞机 没错…

translation.en: Let's go to the bathroom and climax into that thin toilet paper.
translation.zh: 我们去厕所 射在薄薄的厕纸上吧

translation.en: How come in all these videos
translation.zh: 为什么这些视频里

translation.en: puberty for boys is like the miracle of ejaculation
translation.zh: 男孩的青春期都是神奇的射精

translation.en: and for girls we're just a yarn ball of aching tubes?
translation.zh: 而女孩就只是一个纱球穿过疼痛的管子？

translation.en: -Ew, that's gross. -Yeah, exactly.
translation.zh: -好恶心-没错

translation.en: And that's why we need equal pay.
translation.zh: 所以我们需要同工同酬

translation.en: My dad says when you take into account maternity leave,
translation.zh: 我爸说如果算上产假

translation.en: -you do get equal pay. -Your dad's a scumbag DUI attorney.
translation.zh: -男女的薪水其实是平等的-你爸是个变态的醉驾律师

translation.en: Yeah, and he makes bank.
translation.zh: 对 而且他是个大款

translation.en: Too bad he can't afford tweezers for that unibrow.
translation.zh: 可惜他买不起镊子去修一下你的一字眉

translation.en: -[screams] Shut up, Matthew! -Come on, come on, come on!
translation.zh: -闭嘴 马修-来吧

translation.en: Wheels up in 30 seconds.
translation.zh: 30秒之内开始行动

translation.en: Ms. Kazan, can I please go to the bathroom, please?
translation.zh: 卡赞老师 请问我能去厕所吗？

translation.en: If you don't get out of here right now,
translation.zh: 如果你不马上出去

translation.en: we're gonna "Jackson Pollack" all over your pants.
translation.zh: 裤子会被射成杰克逊波洛克的画的

translation.en: -Who? -He's a famous abstract expressionist.
translation.zh: -谁？-著名的抽象表现主义画家

translation.en: -Oh, my God... -I'll take notes for you, Andrew.
translation.zh: -天-我帮你记笔记 安德鲁

translation.en: -Thanks, Missy. -Let's go, let's go.
translation.zh: -谢谢 蜜茜-走吧…

translation.en: -I'm coming, I'm coming. -Not yet.
translation.zh: -我来了…-别那么快来

translation.en: That's why we gotta get to the bathroom, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 不然干嘛去厕所啊 亲爱的

translation.en: Am I a lucky guy or what?
translation.zh: 我多幸运啊

translation.en: I've got this beautiful family, a gorgeous home,
translation.zh: 我有美好的家庭 美丽的家

translation.en: the sounds of Duke Ellington-- a great African-American American.
translation.zh: 艾灵顿公爵的声音他是个伟大的美国非裔美国人

translation.en: Andrew, did you know that Duke Ellington died in this house?
translation.zh: 安德鲁 你知道艾灵顿公爵是在这房子里去世的吗？

translation.en: I did, Dr. Birch. This house has rhythm.
translation.zh: 我知道 博奇教授这座房子充满了律动感

translation.en: That's right. What can I say? I love cocktail facts,
translation.zh: 没错 我能怎么说呢？我爱研究鸡尾酒

translation.en: -and I also love this woman. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 我还爱这个女人

translation.en: Not only did she prepare a fantastic meal
translation.zh: 她不光做了美味的晚餐

translation.en: and birth three beautiful children--
translation.zh: 生育了三个可爱的孩子

translation.en: -no drugs. -Oh, please. Nick slipped right out of me.
translation.zh: -没用药-拜托 尼克直接滑出来的

translation.en: -Mom, Andrew's here. -He's family.
translation.zh: -妈妈 安德鲁还在呢-他不是外人

translation.en: Anyway, he shouldn't be afraid of a vagina.
translation.zh: 再说 他也不该害怕阴道

translation.en: -Okay, can we be excused? -Once you pay the "snuggle tax."
translation.zh: -好了 我们能走了吗？-先付完抱抱税再走

translation.en: -Come here. -Come here.
translation.zh: 过来…

translation.en: -Mom! -[sighs]
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: Oh, I could eat you alive. Mom, can you not do this in front of Andrew?
translation.zh: -我真想把你吃掉-能别在安德鲁面前这么做吗？

translation.en: -You smell like fresh-buttered baby. -Gimme a whiff.
translation.zh: -你闻着就像涂着奶油的婴儿-给我闻一下

translation.en: -Mom, loosen your grip. -I want to put you back up inside.
translation.zh: -妈妈 放开我-真想把你塞回我身体里

translation.en: Okay, we're going up now. Goodbye.
translation.zh: 好了 我们上楼了 再见

translation.en: Love you, Nicholas. Love you. And you, too, Andrew.
translation.zh: 爱你 尼古拉斯 我也爱你 安德鲁

translation.en: What a fantastic best friend. The kid's dynamite.
translation.zh: -抱歉-真是个好朋友 这孩子真有活力

translation.en: From the corner! Swish-hh!
translation.zh: 底角三分 空心入框

translation.en: Hey, so this, like, dance on Friday,
translation.zh: 周五的那个舞会

translation.en: -I think I'm not gonna go. -Oh, please. Yes, you are.
translation.zh: -我不想去了-拜托 你要去

translation.en: I'm not gonna ask a girl. I don't need that kind of rejection.
translation.zh: 我不想邀请女生 我不希望被拒绝

translation.en: We're gonna go as a group-- me, you, Jessi and Jay.
translation.zh: 我们一群人一起去我、你、杰茜和杰伊

translation.en: But Jay's been bragging that he's gonna get fingered at the dance.
translation.zh: 可杰伊一直在吹嘘舞会上会有姑娘帮他指交

translation.en: -What? -He's gonna get fingered.
translation.zh: -什么？-他会被指交

translation.en: Okay, first of all, I think he's got that wrong.
translation.zh: 首先 他理解错指交的意思了

translation.en: Either that or you have grossly misquoted him.
translation.zh: 不然就是你恶心地曲解了他的话

translation.en: And Jay hasn't even kissed a girl, I guarantee it.
translation.zh: 而且杰伊都没亲过女孩 我保证

translation.en: None of us have. Not, you know, with tongue anyway.
translation.zh: 我们都没有 至少没伸过舌头

translation.en: Of course, 'cause when you do kiss a girl, to make it official...
translation.zh: 当然 因为正式地亲吻女孩

translation.en: -There's gotta be tongue. -Major tongue.
translation.zh: -必须伸舌头-大伸特伸

translation.en: -You want to flick your tongue around. -Ideally.
translation.zh: -要把舌头甩来甩去-理想状态下

translation.en: And you really want to get your tongue underneath hers, too.
translation.zh: 而且一定要把舌头伸到她的舌头下面

translation.en: Yeah, you want to get in there like a Claritin to just dissolve.
translation.zh: 对 要像一片就要溶解的抗过敏药

translation.en: -Yeah. [chuckles] -Yeah.
translation.zh: 对…

translation.en: -We know what we're talking about. -It's nice to talk like men.
translation.zh: -我们最懂了-像男人一样聊天真棒

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Ow! It stings.
translation.zh: 好痛

translation.en: But it's worth it.
translation.zh: 但是值得

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -你在干什么？-天啊

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: 嗨…

translation.en: -Don't look. -Of course. I'm not looking at all.
translation.zh: -别看-当然 我没有在看

translation.en: -No! Sorry. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 不… -天啊-对不起

translation.en: -Sorry for what? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -对不起什么？-不知道

translation.en: I don't know either.
translation.zh: 我也不知道

translation.en: You know, I actually didn't even see anything.
translation.zh: 话说 我其实什么都没看到

translation.en: I don't even know what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我都不知道你在讲什么

translation.en: Okay. Well, good night.
translation.zh: 好吧 晚安

translation.en: Knock knock. Who's there? It's the Hormone Monster.
translation.zh: 敲敲门 是谁啊？是荷尔蒙男怪

translation.en: No, no, no, you gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: 不行…你开玩笑的吧

translation.en: -Nick is right there, sir. -And?
translation.zh: -尼克就在旁边 先生-所以呢？

translation.en: And I'm a good person. I wouldn't do that laying next to a friend.
translation.zh: 我是个好人我不能躺在朋友身边打飞机

translation.en: -Then why am I here? -Oh, my God, you're always right.
translation.zh: -那我为什么会出现？-天啊 你说的总是对的

translation.en: -What the hell is wrong with me? -Nothing.
translation.zh: -我到底有什么毛病？-没有

translation.en: You're a perfectly normal gross little dirtbag.
translation.zh: 你是个完全正常的恶心的小变态

translation.en: Now stare at that cat clock and massage your dinger.
translation.zh: 现在 看着那个猫咪时钟把你的那边弄硬

translation.en: No. Nick's grandmother gave him that clock.
translation.zh: 不 这钟是尼克的奶奶给他的

translation.en: -She knew what she was doing. -Yeah, she did.
translation.zh: -她最有经验了-确实

translation.en: -Okay. -Oh...
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: What a little clock-tease.
translation.zh: 真是个小骚钟

translation.en: Her eyes are darting back and forth,
translation.zh: 眼珠转来转去

translation.en: thinking, "Meow-meow, who's got the cream?"
translation.zh: 想着“喵喵 谁有奶油啊？”

translation.en: -Me. I've got the cream. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我 我有奶油-对

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -It's okay. It's okay.
translation.zh: -天啊-没事的

translation.en: Just picture your dad's associate Susan.
translation.zh: 想想你爸爸的同事苏珊

translation.en: -[Andrew] Oh, Susan. -[Hormone Monster] Mmm...
translation.zh: 苏珊

translation.en: Susan actually came to the summer outing,
translation.zh: 苏珊去参加了夏日郊游

translation.en: and she said that I was really sprouting into a fine young man.
translation.zh: 她说我长成了一个俊俏的小伙子

translation.en: That's right. Look at her sinewy arms.
translation.zh: 没错 看看她壮实的手臂

translation.en: -Susan, show me your top naked. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -苏珊 脱掉你的上衣-对

translation.en: -Oh, God. -And she's got Fallopian tubes.
translation.zh: -天啊-她还长了输卵管

translation.en: Oh, God, okay.
translation.zh: 天啊 好吧

translation.en: So, Susan, um, what's it like [grunts] to be in human resources?
translation.zh: 苏珊 在人资部工作是什么感觉？

translation.en: I'm done.
translation.zh: 我完事了

translation.en: Good night, you prince of Westchester, you king of the tri-state area.
translation.zh: 晚安 韦斯切斯特王子三州之王

translation.en: -Wait. What do we do about the mess? -Sleep in it, pig. Mwah.
translation.zh: -等等 射出来的东西怎么处理？-就这么睡吧 小猪

translation.en: So we're not going to Jay's to play basketball?
translation.zh: 我们不去杰伊家打篮球了？

translation.en: No. Um...
translation.zh: 不去了

translation.en: it turns out that I have family stuff this weekend.
translation.zh: 我这周末家里有事

translation.en: Oh. Well... this is me.
translation.zh: 好了 我到了

translation.en: -I'll see you at school on Monday? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -周一学校见？-好

translation.en: Totally. Uh... have a nice rest of your weekend.
translation.zh: 必须的 -周末好好休息-谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you. -Um, you're welcome.
translation.zh: -周末好好休息-谢谢 不用谢

translation.en: -I'll get out on the curb side now. -Yeah, great.
translation.zh: -我从靠人行道那边下车-好

translation.en: -Traffic side. -Yeah, that's smart.
translation.zh: -免得被车撞-对 真聪明

translation.en: Bye, Mrs. Birch.
translation.zh: 再见 博奇太太

translation.en: What's going on? I thought Andrew was staying over all weekend.
translation.zh: 怎么回事？我以为安德鲁要在我们家住一个周末

translation.en: I just-- it's nothing.
translation.zh: 我只是…没什么

translation.en: -Nick? -Nicholas, we're your parents.
translation.zh: -尼克？-尼古拉斯 我们是你的父母

translation.en: You can tell us anything.
translation.zh: 你什么都可以和我们说

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Last night, when he was changing...
translation.zh: 昨晚他换衣服的时候

translation.en: I saw Andrew's penis.
translation.zh: 我看到安德鲁的鸡鸡了

translation.en: And now you're worried you're a homosexual?
translation.zh: 现在你担心自己是同性恋？

translation.en: Nicky, a man can touch another penis or even kiss one, very lightly,
translation.zh: 小尼 男人可以碰别人的鸡鸡甚至轻轻亲一下

translation.en: and it still doesn't necessarily mean he's a homosexual.
translation.zh: 这不代表他就一定是同性恋

translation.en: When I was an undergraduate-- your mother knows this story--
translation.zh: 我上大学的时候…这事你妈知道

translation.en: Dad, I'm not worried I'm gay.
translation.zh: 爸 我没有担心自己是同性恋

translation.en: -Honey, it's fine if you are. -It's better.
translation.zh: -亲爱的 就算是也没关系-那样更好

translation.en: And by the way, you could do a lot worse than Andrew Glouberman.
translation.zh: 再说了 这样总比安德鲁格劳伯曼要好

translation.en: It's not that, it's Andrew's...
translation.zh: 不是那样 是因为安德鲁的…

translation.en: Andrew's was... was different,
translation.zh: 安德鲁的那里…和我的不一样

translation.en: like bigger and hairier.
translation.zh: 更大 毛更多

translation.en: Sweetheart, Andrew's started to become a man.
translation.zh: -亲爱的 安德鲁开始变成男人了-没错

translation.en: He's developed secondary sex characteristics.
translation.zh: 他的第二性征开始发育了

translation.en: -He has. -Thicker eyebrows... -Mm-hmm. -engorged nipples.
translation.zh: -是的-更浓的眉毛 更涨的奶头

translation.en: -Engorged nipples. -Mom!
translation.zh: -涨涨的奶头-妈妈

translation.en: His penis is changing, from a boy penis to a man's penis.
translation.zh: 他的丁丁正从男孩的丁丁变成男人的丁丁

translation.en: -Mom! -And you may, like me,
translation.zh: -妈妈-你也许会像我一样

translation.en: never have a very big penis.
translation.zh: 长不出大丁丁

translation.en: But if you understand a woman's body,
translation.zh: 但只要你了解女人的身体

translation.en: and more importantly her emotions, it doesn't matter.
translation.zh: 以及她的感受 大不大都不重要

translation.en: It's true, Nicky. Before I met your father
translation.zh: 没错 小尼 遇见你爸爸以前

translation.en: I was with some men who were very well-endowed,
translation.zh: 我的男朋友是个天赋异禀的家伙

translation.en: -and honestly, it was too much for me-- -Okay.
translation.zh: -老实说 我觉得有点太大了-好了

translation.en: -Your father's penis is my glass slipper. -And you're my Cinderella.
translation.zh: -你爸爸的丁丁就是我的水晶鞋-你就是我的灰姑娘

translation.en: -Guys, please, stop! -Gimme a break.
translation.zh: -拜托你们别说了-你别闹了

translation.en: I'm sure Andrew and his parents have had very similar conversations.
translation.zh: 安德鲁和他的爸妈肯定也有过类似的谈话

translation.en: Eh... I don't know about that.
translation.zh: 这可说不准

translation.en: And then, you kinda jhoosh it down.
translation.zh: 然后这样塞进去

translation.en: Barbara, what are you doing with my last good banana?
translation.zh: 芭芭拉 你要对最后一根没坏的香蕉干什么呢？

translation.en: Dr. Oz says they need to learn.
translation.zh: 奥兹医生说孩子需要学习这些

translation.en: Oh, he doesn't need to know anything.
translation.zh: 他什么都不需要学

translation.en: -Actually-- -Please, the next time
translation.zh: -实际上…-拜托 安德鲁

translation.en: you think you need to know something, Andrew, shut your face!
translation.zh: 下次你觉得自己要学点什么的时候闭嘴就好

translation.en: Now give me the banana.
translation.zh: 现在把香蕉给我

translation.en: Jesus, it tastes like condom.
translation.zh: 天啊 一股套套的味道

translation.en: Thanks a lot, Mr. Sex Maniac.
translation.zh: 谢谢了 色情狂先生

translation.en: -Hey. -How's it going?
translation.zh: -嗨-你好吗？

translation.en: -Uh, good. -Oh, okay.
translation.zh: -很好-好吧

translation.en: [claps] All right, look alive, you little maniacs.
translation.zh: 好了 打起精神来 小疯子们

translation.en: I bet you're all, like, completely distracted by the big dance,
translation.zh: 你们肯定都被那场盛大的舞会分散了注意力

translation.en: which I happen to be chaperoning.
translation.zh: 而我刚好是舞会的监督

translation.en: You know, not a big deal.
translation.zh: 不是什么大事

translation.en: I mean, they could have asked anyone, but, you know, I volunteered.
translation.zh: 他们可以随便找个人但我自愿报名了

translation.en: Let's just stop talking about the dance
translation.zh: 所以别再说舞会了

translation.en: and just focus on the fundamentals of basketball.
translation.zh: 专心练习篮球基本功

translation.en: Oh, man, I hope they play music we like.
translation.zh: 天啊 希望会放我们喜欢的音乐

translation.en: Bruh, I can't believe the dance is the same night as the Knicks game.
translation.zh: 舞会居然和尼克斯的球赛撞时间了

translation.en: Yeah, it sucks. Porzingis is awesome, though, right?
translation.zh: 是啊 真糟糕波尔津吉斯超强的 对吧？

translation.en: [Andrew] Oh, yeah. For a seven-footer, he's got an amazing shot.
translation.zh: 七尺大个还能有那么好的投篮手感

translation.en: Either way they gotta start playing defense.
translation.zh: 但他们必须好好防守

translation.en: [muffled] Oh, yeah, they gotta defend better in the paint.
translation.zh: 对 得加强内线防守

translation.en: -What? -I said, they gotta defend better in the paint.
translation.zh: -什么？-他们得加强内线防守

translation.en: [mutters] Oh, my God, I'm losing my mind.
translation.zh: 天啊 我要疯了

translation.en: ♪ Big dicks! ♪ ♪ Hoops, hoops, hoops, hoops! ♪
translation.zh: 大丁丁

translation.en: ♪ Penises playing basketball ♪
translation.zh: 小丁丁打篮球

translation.en: -♪ Big dicks shootin' hoops ♪ -♪ Hoops, hoops! ♪
translation.zh: 大丁丁也能投篮

translation.en: ♪ Passin', dribblin', bouncin', jigglin' ♪
translation.zh: 传球 带球 拍球 扔球

translation.en: ♪ Big dicks on the loose ♪
translation.zh: 大丁丁就是这么浪

translation.en: -♪ What? ♪ -No! Get away! Stop it!
translation.zh: -怎样？-让开 停下

translation.en: What the hell, man?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: All right, knock it off, you two. Jeez, Louise.
translation.zh: 好了 你们俩消停点 天啊

translation.en: Who wants to watch me grab rim?
translation.zh: 谁想看我抓篮筐？

translation.en: I knocked the wind outta my balls.
translation.zh: 我的蛋蛋被压扁了

translation.en: Hope I'm okay for the dance.
translation.zh: 希望不会影响舞会

translation.en: Why would Nick push me? Why is he being so weird?
translation.zh: 尼克为什么要推我？他为什么那么奇怪？

translation.en: Who cares? Nick's a baby.
translation.zh: 谁在乎？尼克就是个巨婴

translation.en: Let's watch the sex scene from Dallas Buyers Club.
translation.zh: 来看《达拉斯买家俱乐部》的床戏吧

translation.en: Oh, my God, do you think Nick saw me jerking off?
translation.zh: 天啊 尼克会不会看到我打飞机了？

translation.en: I told you I shouldn't do it in his room.
translation.zh: 我就说过不该在他房间打的

translation.en: Or, here's an idea-- maybe he's jealous of what a fucking man you are.
translation.zh: 不如这么想也许他是嫉妒你变成男人了

translation.en: You should kick his ass.
translation.zh: 你应该揍他一顿

translation.en: Do that curbing thing where you stick his teeth on the edge of a curb
translation.zh: 把他的牙齿贴在马路牙子上

translation.en: and stomp on the back of his head, what's that called?
translation.zh: 然后踹他的后脑勺这招叫啥来着？

translation.en: -"Curbing"? -Yeah, that makes sense.
translation.zh: -马路牙？-对 有道理

translation.en: You should curb Nick.
translation.zh: 你应该马路牙尼克

translation.en: Now let's watch McConaughey bang two meth heads at a rodeo,
translation.zh: 快来看麦康纳在斗牛场里干两个吸毒女

translation.en: and try not to think about AIDS.
translation.zh: 同时努力忘掉艾滋

translation.en: -Andrew... -Yeah?
translation.zh: -安德鲁-怎么？

translation.en: I'm thinking about AIDS.
translation.zh: 我在想艾滋了

translation.en: Duke? Duke Ellington?
translation.zh: 艾灵顿公爵？

translation.en: Ghost of Duke Ellington, are you up here?
translation.zh: 艾灵顿公爵的鬼魂 你在吗？

translation.en: Hey, hey, Nick! [laughing]
translation.zh: 嘿…尼克

translation.en: You up here for some advice?
translation.zh: 你想要我的建议？

translation.en: You know, sometimes, it feels like you're the only one I can turn to.
translation.zh: 有些问题我只能问你

translation.en: I get it, the living don't always have all the answers.
translation.zh: -我懂 活人并不总是有答案-对

translation.en: -Yeah. -Lucky for you, I'm trapped between two realms. [laughing]
translation.zh: 算你走运 我被困在了人界和天界之间

translation.en: -So, what's the problem? -Duke, I saw Andrew's penis,
translation.zh: -有什么问题？-公爵 我看到了安德鲁的丁丁

translation.en: and it was, like, way bigger and hairier than mine.
translation.zh: 它比我的大很多 还有好多毛

translation.en: [chuckles] Happened to me once, too. The Cotton Club, 1938.
translation.zh: 我也碰到过这种事1938年 棉花俱乐部

translation.en: I saw Charlie Parker's penis in a bathroom,
translation.zh: 我在厕所里看到了查理帕克的丁丁

translation.en: and, good Lord, I felt inferior.
translation.zh: 上天啊 我自卑死了

translation.en: I mean, there's a reason they called him "The Bird."
translation.zh: 人们叫他“大鸟”是有原因的

translation.en: What's the reason?
translation.zh: 什么原因？

translation.en: Because his pubic hair looked like feathers.
translation.zh: 因为他的阴毛就像羽毛一样

translation.en: -So what'd you do? -I went out
translation.zh: -那你是怎么做的？-我走了出去

translation.en: and made sweet love to Eva Gabor.
translation.zh: 和伊娃加博尔大战了一番

translation.en: -No shit? -[cackling]
translation.zh: 不会吧？

translation.en: That's right, I balled a white woman back when it really meant something.
translation.zh: 没错 我上了一个白人女子那时候这可是个大事

translation.en: So you're saying--
translation.zh: 所以你是说…

translation.en: I'm saying, having a pretty girl on your arm
translation.zh: 拥着一个美丽的姑娘

translation.en: can make you feel a thousand feet tall.
translation.zh: 会让你自信一千倍

translation.en: So I should find the prettiest girl in school and ask her out?
translation.zh: 所以我应该约全校最好看的姑娘出去？

translation.en: Bingo-bango! "Furry triangle," if you know what I'm saying.
translation.zh: 没有错 就是做 你懂的

translation.en: I think I do. Thanks, Duke.
translation.zh: 我好像懂了 谢谢你 公爵

translation.en: Happy to help, little big guy.
translation.zh: 乐意效劳 小巨人

translation.en: -Shall I play you out? -Yeah, that'd be nice.
translation.zh: -要我奏乐送你出去吗？-好啊

translation.en: ♪ Talkin' about a furry triangle, yeah ♪
translation.zh: 就是跟她做

translation.en: -♪ Furry triangle, baby ♪ -[bell ringing]
translation.zh: 就是做

translation.en: Oh, hey, guys, I just wanted to remind you,
translation.zh: 各位 提醒你们一下

translation.en: the theme of the dance is "A Night in Ancient Mesopotamia."
translation.zh: 舞会的主题是“美索不达米亚之夜”

translation.en: We're gonna put the "social" back in social studies.
translation.zh: 我们要以社会学的名义社交

translation.en: Missy, do you mind? I'm doing a magic trick.
translation.zh: 蜜茜 先别说了 我在变魔术

translation.en: I love magic! It's like juggling, but it's definitely more confrontational,
translation.zh: 我喜欢魔术 它就像杂耍但是更有冲突性

translation.en: that's for sure.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: Yeah, it's like one person playing cards at you.
translation.zh: 就像是别人在对着你打牌

translation.en: Okay, guys, shut up.
translation.zh: 好了 安静

translation.en: Okay, anyway, I think I have something in my mouth.
translation.zh: 我觉得我的嘴里有东西

translation.en: Is this your card?
translation.zh: 这是你的牌吗？

translation.en: Wow, Jay! I could barely tell
translation.zh: 杰伊 我差点没看出

translation.en: that you had the card palmed in your hand when you reached into your mouth.
translation.zh: 你在把手伸进嘴里时把牌藏在了手掌中

translation.en: -Damn it, Missy! -If it's any consolation,
translation.zh: -该死 蜜茜-安慰你一下

translation.en: I literally never gave a shit about this from the beginning, so--
translation.zh: 我根本就不在乎你的魔术 所以…

translation.en: You guys are the fucking worst!
translation.zh: 你们烂透了

translation.en: It doesn't get any cooler when you get, like, really angry.
translation.zh: 就算你生气你的魔术也不会变得更酷

translation.en: ♪ Talkin' about a furry triangle ♪
translation.zh: 就是做

translation.en: Here we go, Nick.
translation.zh: 走吧 尼克

translation.en: Whoa. What the hell is he doing?
translation.zh: 他在搞什么？

translation.en: Hello! Nick's going to talk to the eighth graders.
translation.zh: 尼克要去和八年级生搭话

translation.en: My God, he's got that Brian Grazer bravery.
translation.zh: 天啊 他有布莱恩格雷泽一般的勇气

translation.en: -He's a petite, but he'll talk to anyone. -Oh, no.
translation.zh: -身材娇小 但愿意和所有人说话-糟糕

translation.en: Those girls are gonna eat him alive,
translation.zh: 那些姑娘会把他吃掉

translation.en: and then barf him out because they're bulimic.
translation.zh: 然后再吐出来因为她们有暴食症

translation.en: You're fucking funny. She's funny!
translation.zh: 你真该死的搞笑 她好搞笑

translation.en: We're friends now.
translation.zh: 我们是朋友了

translation.en: [thinking] Don't mess this up, don't mess this up.
translation.zh: 别搞砸…

translation.en: Play it cool. You've got the chops.
translation.zh: 酷一点 你是有料的

translation.en: [narrator] ...travel down the Fallopian tube...
translation.zh: 沿着输卵管…

translation.en: -I want to put you back up inside. -Kiss the penis lightly.
translation.zh: -我真想把你塞回去-轻轻亲一下丁丁

translation.en: -I knocked the wind out of my balls. -Ugh!
translation.zh: 我的蛋蛋被压扁了

translation.en: Hey, Olivia, this is like a stupid idea,
translation.zh: 嘿 奥利维亚 我有个愚蠢的想法

translation.en: but do you wanna, like, go to the dance with me?
translation.zh: 你愿意跟我一起参加舞会吗？

translation.en: Dance? Cute. Yeah.
translation.zh: 舞会？可爱 好啊

translation.en: Oh. Okay, great.
translation.zh: 真棒

translation.en: Great. Cute, yeah.
translation.zh: 真棒 可爱 好啊

translation.en: Yeah, cute. Great.
translation.zh: 好啊 可爱 真棒

translation.en: -It's a palindrome. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -这是首回文诗-没错

translation.en: Okay, bye.
translation.zh: 好了 再见

translation.en: I kinda thought we were going to the dance as a group.
translation.zh: 我以为我们要一起去舞会的

translation.en: That weasel bailed on you. He's such a slippery little shit.
translation.zh: 那个小人背叛了你他真是个狡猾的小混蛋

translation.en: -Hey, guys. -Tell him.
translation.zh: -你们好-告诉他

translation.en: What the hell? You asked Olivia to the dance?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？你邀请奥利维亚去舞会了？

translation.en: Yeah. What's the big deal?
translation.zh: 对 怎么了？

translation.en: You said you were going with us.
translation.zh: 你说过要和我们一起去的

translation.en: Yeah, but I mean, it's not like we had definitive plans.
translation.zh: 对 但我们本来也没定好计划

translation.en: [growls] Rage, rage, fucking rage! That's bullshit!
translation.zh: 愤怒 怒起来 他在瞎说

translation.en: -That's bullshit. -Andrew, dial it down.
translation.zh: -你胡扯-安德鲁 冷静一点

translation.en: -Everybody can see your feelings. -Yeah, you're acting kinda weird.
translation.zh: -所有人都能看见你的情绪-你好奇怪

translation.en: I'm not acting weird, you're acting weird.
translation.zh: 我不奇怪 你才奇怪

translation.en: Dude, I'm allowed to go to the dance with whoever I want.
translation.zh: 老兄 我可以自己选择和谁去舞会

translation.en: It's not like you're my girlfriend or something.
translation.zh: 你又不是我的女朋友

translation.en: All right, that's it! Let's find a curb
translation.zh: 好吧 不忍了 咱们去找个马路牙

translation.en: and smash that pretty little smile off his face!
translation.zh: 让他再也笑不出来

translation.en: Fuck you.
translation.zh: 该死的

translation.en: Fight, fight! Worldstar!
translation.zh: 快打…打起来…

translation.en: Fight!
translation.zh: 打起来

translation.en: [Matthew] Exclusive-- "Laurel and Farty" are about to fight.
translation.zh: 独家新闻：狗屁黄金搭档就要打起来了

translation.en: Just... fuck you, man.
translation.zh: 该死的 兄弟

translation.en: [wheezing] I got a card stuck in my windpipe.
translation.zh: 我的气管里卡了一张牌

translation.en: -Was that your card? -Nope.
translation.zh: -这是你的牌吗？-不是

translation.en: [snaps] Oh, come on!
translation.zh: 不会吧

translation.en: Andrew hasn't been over since the night of the penis,
translation.zh: 被看到小丁丁以后安德鲁就没有再来过了

translation.en: and I think Nicky misses him.
translation.zh: 小尼克应该很想他

translation.en: Poor kid. You know, when I was Nicky's age
translation.zh: 可怜的孩子 我像他那么大时

translation.en: I had a bald little cashew,
translation.zh: 那里就是个光秃秃的小腰果

translation.en: and my friend Don Kinney, he had this great big sausage
translation.zh: 我朋友唐金尼长了根大香肠

translation.en: nestled in a thick robin's nest of pubic hair.
translation.zh: 矗立在浓密的阴毛搭成的鸟巢上

translation.en: It was something to behold.
translation.zh: 真是让人移不开眼睛

translation.en: Is Don the one who only got house arrest for insider trading?
translation.zh: 唐就是那个因为内线交易被软禁的？

translation.en: Yeah. The system is so broken.
translation.zh: 对 这国家真是要完

translation.en: Oh, Elliot, I love it when you talk about broken institutions.
translation.zh: 埃利奥特 我喜欢听你批判国家

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. -[Elliot] Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: -喜欢吗？-对

translation.en: Wow, 12 hours and one minute.
translation.zh: 12小时又1分钟

translation.en: Whew! That was astounding.
translation.zh: 12小时又1分钟 真是惊人

translation.en: Anyway, I think this is something the boys need to figure out for themselves.
translation.zh: 我觉得这件事得让孩子们自己解决

translation.en: Nick the Trick. [laughs]
translation.zh: 神奇尼克

translation.en: -Hey, Duke. -What's wrong, kid?
translation.zh: -嗨 公爵-孩子 怎么了？

translation.en: You nervous about your big date?
translation.zh: 在为了约会紧张吗？

translation.en: I'm honestly more nervous about seeing Andrew.
translation.zh: 我其实比较怕见到安德鲁

translation.en: -He said, "Fuck you" to me yesterday. -Ah!
translation.zh: 昨天他对我说了“该死的”

translation.en: I regret one fight I had with my saxophonist, Studs Dupree.
translation.zh: 我很后悔和我的萨克斯手斯塔兹杜普里吵架

translation.en: -It got pretty ugly. -What happened? Did you guys make up?
translation.zh: -事情闹得很难看-后来呢？你们和好了吗？

translation.en: Well, I was waiting for him to apologize, and then he died of a heroin overdose.
translation.zh: 我一直在等他道歉结果他因为过度吸食海洛因去世了

translation.en: Wow. That must have been really tough.
translation.zh: 你肯定很难过吧

translation.en: Yeah. I never did get that apology.
translation.zh: 对 我没有等到那句抱歉

translation.en: -Oh, hi, Missy. -Hey, Andrew.
translation.zh: -嗨 蜜茜-嗨 安德鲁

translation.en: Oh, actually, just for tonight could you refer to me as "Nanshe"?
translation.zh: 今晚你可以叫我娜社吗？

translation.en: The goddess of social justice...
translation.zh: 社会公正女神…

translation.en: -and also fishing. -That's great.
translation.zh: -也是捕鱼女神-真棒

translation.en: So should I pay for my ticket in ancient Sumerian silver?
translation.zh: 我要用古苏美尔银币付账吗？

translation.en: I get it. Mesopotamian silver mines
translation.zh: 我懂 美索不达米亚银矿

translation.en: weren't actually operational until the mid-Bronze Age.
translation.zh: 直到青铜时代中期才开始挖掘

translation.en: That's a great one. Where's Nick?
translation.zh: 真好笑 尼克呢？

translation.en: I wouldn't know. We decided to come alone.
translation.zh: 不知道 我们决定分头过来

translation.en: You know, I find that being alone is actually a great gift
translation.zh: 我发现孤独是很棒的礼物

translation.en: because it prepares you for what real life is, um, is like.
translation.zh: 因为它能帮助你为真正的人生做好准备

translation.en: Yeah, I guess.
translation.zh: 可能吧

translation.en: So, what's the deal after this thing? You guys wanna go get drinks?
translation.zh: 结束以后有计划吗？要不要去喝一杯？

translation.en: I don't know, go to Panera, split a bread bowl?
translation.zh: 或者去面包店吃一碗面包浓汤？

translation.en: Yeah, no, thanks.
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢

translation.en: We'll probably just go home and grade papers.
translation.zh: 我们准备直接回家批作业

translation.en: [snorts] Teachers at this school, you know, they never wanna hang out.
translation.zh: 这所学校的老师都不愿意出去玩

translation.en: -They're always "so busy." -They're a gaggle of rancid cunts.
translation.zh: -他们都好忙-他们就是一群臭婊子

translation.en: Yeah! I mean, that's, you know... pff-fft! That's a little harsh,
translation.zh: 对 你懂的… 这话有点过了但我们应该是站在同一边的

translation.en: but I think we're basically on the same page.
translation.zh: 这话有点过了但我们应该是站在同一边的

translation.en: Hey, ladies, you havin' fun?
translation.zh: 姑娘们 玩得开心吗？

translation.en: -I think tonight's gonna be pretty... hot! -[girls scream]
translation.zh: 今晚一定会非常… -火热的-天啊 搞什么？

translation.en: Oh, my God, what the hell?
translation.zh: -火热的-天啊 搞什么？

translation.en: Yeah, we're wearing a ton of hairspray, you psycho!
translation.zh: 我们涂了好多发胶 神经病

translation.en: [screams] I am not a psycho!
translation.zh: 我不是神经病

translation.en: -Well played, Jay. -Look, your butt buddy's here.
translation.zh: -好样的 杰伊-看 你的基友来了

translation.en: We're not actually butt buddies anymore.
translation.zh: 我们已经不是基友了

translation.en: So, like, you've got an opening? I'd love to throw my butt in the ring.
translation.zh: 所以你在空窗期？我可以和你基一下

translation.en: -I don't like going to your house. -Oh, no, I promise,
translation.zh: -我不喜欢去你家-不会的 我保证

translation.en: my brothers aren't gonna make you poop in a litter box again.
translation.zh: 我的兄弟们不会再让你用小盒子大便了

translation.en: -[phone clicking] -Good evening, Nicholas.
translation.zh: -晚上好 尼古拉斯-晚上好 杰茜卡

translation.en: -Good evening, Jessica. -You psyched for your "big date"?
translation.zh: -晚上好 尼古拉斯-晚上好 杰茜卡 要约会了 激动吗？

translation.en: Yeah, well, Olivia's pretty much the hottest girl in school,
translation.zh: 当然 奥利维亚是全校最火辣的姑娘

translation.en: -so... mm, I'm pretty psyched. -Yeah, you should be psyched.
translation.zh: -所以我很激动-你应该激动

translation.en: Just be prepared for some super-intellectual conversation.
translation.zh: 准备迎接超级有营养的对话吧

translation.en: -Why do you keep looking over at Andrew? -I'm not looking at Andrew,
translation.zh: -你为什么一直看着安德鲁？-我没有看安德鲁

translation.en: -I'm excited for my date with Olivia. -Of course, yeah.
translation.zh: -我只是为了跟奥利维亚约会激动-当然

translation.en: She's a beautiful complex woman whose eyes go dead when she applies lip gloss.
translation.zh: 她是个美丽又有深度的女性涂唇蜜的时候眼睛了无生气

translation.en: -Well, Jessi, this has been so much fun. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -杰茜 和你聊天真开心-是啊

translation.en: But it looks like my super hot eighth-grade date has arrived.
translation.zh: 但我超辣的八年级女伴已经到了

translation.en: [Jessi] Yeah, I can see her.
translation.zh: 对 我看到她了

translation.en: Holy shit, Olivia's hot.
translation.zh: 见鬼 奥利维亚真辣

translation.en: I'm gonna pump my pillow full of Jay jizz later thinking about it.
translation.zh: 今晚我要想着她射满我的枕头

translation.en: Oh, hey, Olivia. You want to get a drink or something?
translation.zh: 嗨 奥利维亚 要喝杯饮料吗？

translation.en: I think they have La Croix. It's only the coconut kind,
translation.zh: 他们有苏打水 不过只有椰子味的

translation.en: which is a little gross, but it's still kinda--
translation.zh: 有点恶心 不过还是…

translation.en: No, sorry. Dylan.
translation.zh: 不用了 谢谢 -迪伦-谁？

translation.en: Oh-- who? I thought we were going to this dance, like, together.
translation.zh: -迪伦-谁？ 我以为我们要一起跳舞的

translation.en: No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不…

translation.en: Sorry, bro, she wants a real man.
translation.zh: 抱歉 兄弟 她要的是真男人

translation.en: Ninth grade, top of the food chain.
translation.zh: 九年级 食物链顶端

translation.en: Um, actually, sweets and fats are at the top of the food chain.
translation.zh: 九年级 食物链顶端 甜食和脂肪才是食物链顶端

translation.en: Oh, poor Nick. He's confusing the food pyramid with the food chain.
translation.zh: 可怜的尼克他把食物金字塔当成食物链了

translation.en: Oh, hi, Andrew. Would you perchance like to celebrate the autumnal equinox
translation.zh: 嗨 安德鲁 你想不想一起庆祝秋分

translation.en: with a, um... with a... with a dance with me?
translation.zh: 和我…跳个舞？

translation.en: -Oh, I would, Missy, but-- -Hey, are you out of your goddamn mind?
translation.zh: -我愿意 蜜茜 可是…-嘿 你疯了吗？

translation.en: -This is a real girl. -She's not a girl, she's Missy.
translation.zh: -这是个真正的姑娘-她不是姑娘 她是蜜茜

translation.en: Oh, she's a girl, and she wants to dance with you.
translation.zh: 她是个姑娘 而且她想和你跳舞

translation.en: -But Nick looks really upset-- -Fucking forget about that little Pikachu
translation.zh: -但尼克看起来很沮丧-忘掉那只小皮卡丘吧

translation.en: [growls] and dance with a girl!
translation.zh: 和姑娘跳舞去

translation.en: -Um, sure, Missy. -Oh, great.
translation.zh: -好啊 蜜茜-真棒

translation.en: We can just-- so we can start now, 'cause I know how to do it.
translation.zh: 我们可以开始了 因为我很会跳舞

translation.en: I've practiced with my dad.
translation.zh: 我和我爸爸练过

translation.en: -Hey, Mr. DJ, you take requests? -No, I do not.
translation.zh: -DJ 可以点歌吗？-不行

translation.en: -What about "Lady in Red"? -If I play it, will you leave?
translation.zh: -《红裙女郎》怎么样？-如果我播了 你会闭嘴吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sure, unless, I don't know, you want me to stick around.
translation.zh: 当然 除非你希望我留下来陪你

translation.en: -Nah. -Are you streaming that?
translation.zh: -不要-你是在线播放的？

translation.en: What is that, Wi-Fi? They gave you the Wi-Fi password.
translation.zh: 那是无线网吗？他们居然给了你密码

translation.en: Heh. Okay.
translation.zh: 那是无线网吗？他们居然给了你密码 好吧

translation.en: -Hi. -Jessi, please,
translation.zh: -嗨-杰茜 拜托

translation.en: I don't want to hear "I told you so."
translation.zh: 我不想听到“我早就说过”

translation.en: I know, but I want to say it so bad.
translation.zh: 我知道 但我真的好想说

translation.en: Can I just say it one time and you cover your ears?
translation.zh: 可以捂住耳朵让我说一次吗？

translation.en: I told you so!
translation.zh: 我早就说过

translation.en: -Well, I'm glad you feel better. -I do, a little.
translation.zh: -这下你舒坦了吧-是舒坦了

translation.en: -But I feel like I can feel even better... -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 但如果能让你听到

translation.en: -...if you heard it. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 我会更舒坦

translation.en: [screeching] ♪ Lady in red ♪
translation.zh: 红裙女郎

translation.en: ♪ Is dancing with me ♪
translation.zh: 与我共舞

translation.en: ♪ Cheek to cheek ♪
translation.zh: 贴面缠绵

translation.en: I've never danced with a boy before. What am I supposed to say?
translation.zh: 我从没和男生跳过舞 我该说什么？

translation.en: I don't know. That was great.
translation.zh: 不知道 这样挺好的

translation.en: You're doing great. I think we're both doing great.
translation.zh: 你跳得很好 我俩都跳得很好

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah, you're both doing great.
translation.zh: 对 都很好

translation.en: Now let's get a little friction going.
translation.zh: 现在我们来摩擦一下

translation.en: ♪ And I hardly know... ♪
translation.zh: 虽然是萍水相逢

translation.en: ♪ This beauty by my side ♪
translation.zh: 我身边的姑娘啊

translation.en: ♪ I never will forget-- ♪ I got a great memory.
translation.zh: 我永远不会忘记…我记性很好的

translation.en: [Hormone Monster, Coach] ♪ The way you look tonight ♪
translation.zh: 今晚的你

translation.en: I don't know, I guess I thought Olivia liked me.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我还以为奥利维亚喜欢我

translation.en: Really? Olivia only likes jeggings.
translation.zh: 真的？奥利维亚只喜欢穿紧身裤的

translation.en: I get it, Jessi, I'm an idiot.
translation.zh: 我懂 杰茜 我是个白痴

translation.en: No! She's the idiot. You're...
translation.zh: 不 她才是白痴 你…

translation.en: you're cute, even though you're tiny.
translation.zh: 你很可爱 尽管很瘦小

translation.en: You're like a troll doll who's figured out his hair.
translation.zh: 你就像是梳好了头发的丑娃

translation.en: -Thank you...? -You're welcome...?
translation.zh: -谢谢-不用谢

translation.en: [thinking] What do I do? What do I do? What do I do?
translation.zh: 我该怎么办？

translation.en: Stick your tongue underneath her tongue...
translation.zh: 把舌头伸到她的舌头下面

translation.en: Pay the snuggle tax.
translation.zh: 交抱抱税

translation.en: Can I just get a hint for the Wi-Fi password?
translation.zh: 能提示一下无线密码是什么吗？

translation.en: [Jessi gurgles] Uh! Tongue.
translation.zh: 舌头

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yes, that's it.
translation.zh: 对 就是这样

translation.en: Don't be afraid to lead with your groin, the world's slowest hula hoop.
translation.zh: 大胆地移动你的下体这是世界上最慢的呼啦圈

translation.en: [moans] Oh-hh! This is working.
translation.zh: 有效果了

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Take it easy. We're 70 yards from the bathroom, brother.
translation.zh: 慢一点 我们离厕所还很远呢

translation.en: You need to slow it down.
translation.zh: 你得慢一点

translation.en: [grunting] No, can't slow it down, can't slow it down.
translation.zh: 不 慢不下来了

translation.en: Fuck it. If you're okay with it, I'm okay with it. I'm okay with it. [grunting]
translation.zh: -你没意见 我就没意见-我没意见

translation.en: -♪ Jai ho! ♪ -[grunts]
translation.zh: 胜利了

translation.en: -Whoa, what's wrong? -Uh...
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: -I have to go, Missy. -But the dance isn't-- oh, darn it.
translation.zh: -我得走了 蜜茜-可是这支舞还没… 该死

translation.en: You have a really big mouth.
translation.zh: 你的嘴好大

translation.en: Thank you, I think?
translation.zh: 谢谢…吧？

translation.en: The flicking was an interesting choice.
translation.zh: 甩来甩去倒是挺有趣的

translation.en: Yeah. Tongues feel weird.
translation.zh: 对啊 舌头感觉好奇怪

translation.en: [muttering] Oh, my God, oh, my God, oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天啊…

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Oh, no! That's the most I've ever made.
translation.zh: 天啊 我从没射过这么多

translation.en: Oh, shit, my phone.
translation.zh: 该死 我的手机

translation.en: -Wait, what the-- -[splashes]
translation.zh: 等等 怎么…

translation.en: -Oh, my God, isn't this exciting? -There's no time for excitement.
translation.zh: -天啊 好激动-没时间激动了

translation.en: We gotta find the egg. Where are we, Fallopian tube, uterus?
translation.zh: 我们必须找到卵子这是哪里 输卵管？子宫？

translation.en: We're in a pussy right now, right?
translation.zh: 我们是在阴道里吧？

translation.en: Uh... you guys are gonna be really disappointed.
translation.zh: 你们会很失望的

translation.en: -Are we in another sock? -No, no, no.
translation.zh: -又是在袜子里？-不

translation.en: -A toilet. -What is wrong with you, Andrew?
translation.zh: -马桶里-你怎么搞的？安德鲁

translation.en: -You're completely out of control. -I didn't mean to!
translation.zh: -你真是太失控了-我不是故意的

translation.en: This girl asked me to slow dance, and I got all tingly and lightheaded.
translation.zh: 那个姑娘邀请我慢舞我太激动了 有点头重脚轻

translation.en: Hey, jizz pants, there's your stupid phone.
translation.zh: -秒射男 你的手机在那儿-感谢上帝

translation.en: -Oh, thank God. -There is no God.
translation.zh: -秒射男 你的手机在那儿-感谢上帝 -根本没有上帝-来 我们游到那块巨大的棕色石头吧

translation.en: Come on, let's swim to that giant brown rock.
translation.zh: -根本没有上帝-来 我们游到那块巨大的棕色石头吧

translation.en: Not to sound gay, but I miss the balls.
translation.zh: 听起来可能有点基但是我好想念蛋蛋啊

translation.en: Ahem. Yeah, I guess I should probably go check on Andrew.
translation.zh: 我最好去看看安德鲁

translation.en: Yeah, no, I think that's like a good idea.
translation.zh: 对 这是个好主意

translation.en: Yeah, but thank you for the...
translation.zh: 还是谢谢你…

translation.en: -Sure, no problem. -Ahem.
translation.zh: 当然 没问题

translation.en: -Good night, milady. -Good evening, good sir.
translation.zh: -晚安 我的女士-晚安 先生

translation.en: Oh, boy.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -[sighs] -What happened to you? I came in my pants.
translation.zh: -你怎么了？-我射在裤子里了

translation.en: And that made you soaking wet?
translation.zh: 全身都射湿了？

translation.en: -Why are you being so mean to me? -What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -你干嘛怎么刻薄？-你说什么呢？

translation.en: You've been mean to me all week. What did I do?
translation.zh: 你这一周都对我很刻薄我做错什么了？

translation.en: You didn't do anything! I--
translation.zh: 你没有做错 是我…

translation.en: I saw your...
translation.zh: 我看到了你的…

translation.en: -and it was big and hairy. -Yeah, so?
translation.zh: -它又大又多毛-所以呢？

translation.en: And mine isn't, and I don't know if it ever will be.
translation.zh: 而我的不大 而且也许永远长不大

translation.en: Well, count your blessings. Mine's not so great either.
translation.zh: 算你走运 我的丁丁也不怎么样

translation.en: [sobs] Mine just made me jizz in my nice pants.
translation.zh: 刚刚还射在裤子里了

translation.en: It's embarrassing.
translation.zh: 真尴尬

translation.en: Everything's embarrassing.
translation.zh: 一切都好尴尬

translation.en: Everything is so embarrassing.
translation.zh: 一切都非常尴尬

translation.en: -My pants are in the toilet. -Oh, man. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -我的裤子在马桶里-天啊

translation.en: Andrew, why didn't you wash them in the sink?
translation.zh: 安德鲁为什么不在洗手池里洗裤子？

translation.en: [laughing] That is a great question, Nick.
translation.zh: 这个问题真棒 尼克

translation.en: It's because I panicked. What am I gonna do?
translation.zh: 因为我慌了 我该怎么办？

translation.en: Nick and Andrew, you're friends again. Nick's pants are gone.
translation.zh: 尼克和安德鲁 你们和好了尼克的裤子不见了

translation.en: The teachers look poor. What the fuck is going on?
translation.zh: 老师一脸衰样 到底怎么回事？

translation.en: Well, Matthew, it's been a great night in ancient Mesopotamia--
translation.zh: 马修 美索不达米亚的夜晚很美好…

translation.en: [Matthew] Boring! Nick, we heard you kissed Jessi in the hallway.
translation.zh: 无聊 尼克 听说你在走廊里和杰茜接吻了

translation.en: Uh, Jessi and I would appreciate that you respect our privacy at this time.
translation.zh: 请你尊重我和杰茜的隐私

translation.en: Sounds like he fingered her.
translation.zh: 他好像给她指交了

translation.en: Join us tomorrow when we find out Coach Steve
translation.zh: 明天的节目中我们将揭露史蒂夫教练

translation.en: lives in a joke of an apartment near the airport.
translation.zh: 其实住在机场附近的超烂公寓里

translation.en: LaGuardia, and, technically, I live in a storage unit, so...
translation.zh: 是拉瓜迪亚而且我住的是储物间

translation.en: -Hello? -Oh, uh, good evening.
translation.zh: -你好-晚上好

translation.en: -Who are you? -Don't worry about it.
translation.zh: -你是谁？-别管我

translation.en: I'm just here to give your friend a nocturnal emission.
translation.zh: 我只是来帮你的朋友梦遗的

translation.en: Are you the puberty fairy?
translation.zh: 你是青春期仙子吗？

translation.en: -The fuck did you just call me?! -The puberty fairy?
translation.zh: -你叫我什么？-青春期仙子？

translation.en: "Puberty fairy"? I'm the Hormone Monster.
translation.zh: 青春期仙子？我是荷尔蒙男怪

translation.en: I'm not a fairy.
translation.zh: 我不是仙子

translation.en: I mean, sure, I fuck around with dudes but I'm not a fairy.
translation.zh: 虽然我和所有男生乱搞但我不是仙子
